rules_text:
[i]Concord[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, if there are four or more card types among permanents you control, create a Treasure token.
{W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}, {T}: Exile Star of the Sands. For the rest of the game, you may cast cards from your hand without paying their mana costs.
